about_the_game:
ABOUT THE LOST NOMAD

The Lost Nomad is role-playing game (RPG) and (survival system) that made by one solo developer. with an engaging building system and resource management mechanics, chose your own path in the disintegrated world. The interactive nature of the game world holds the power to shape the destiny of this realm, offering multiple endings to discover. Embark on this adventure unknown one, and traverse the shattered lands.

You can go through this experience alone or play cooperatively with a team of four players.



EXPLORATION

DISCOVER THE WORLD MYSTERIES
As a lost unknown individual, you discover a world of diverse regions, each with its own unique characters, personalities, and political factions.
You encounter a variety of ethnicities, races, and monsters in this shattered world.
What impact will you have on this world, and what secrets have been lost to time?



SURVIVNG

GATHER, CRAFT, EVOLVE AND SURVIVE
In order to survive in this harsh world, players must collect resources, craft items, and evolve their character.
Develop your skills in:
* Develop and enhance player statistics.
* Cook food for healing and stat boosts
* Create medicines to treat wounds and enhance skills.
* Craft traps to aid in survival.
* Develop and craft equipment, including weapons and armor.
* Brew potions, alchemical and magical items.
And more.



STORY - CAMPAIGN

CHOOSE THE WORLD DESTINY
Determine your destiny in this disintegrated world by interacting with the characters and learning more about this world and its secrets.
Determine the path you will take through the dialogues and their associated outcomes in your misions.
The campaign is structured as a series of main tasks and sub-tasks.



CHALLENGE

MASTER AND SPECIALIZE YOUR FIELD
Choose a profession and playstyle, with the development system linked to professions and weapon proficiencies. Players must specialize in their field and contribute to their group to achieve the best results.

Interactive Combat System
Combat requires concentration, dodging, countering, and the use of different skills. Players must cooperate with their group to achieve effectiveness.



CONSTRUCT & DEFEND

CONSTRUCT & FORTIFY YOUR CASTLE
You must construct a base and fortify it against enemies attack. The base serves as the player's foundation for development in this world. The player must construct and upgrade crafting tables and buildings to create items, armors and weapons. The player must also protect their fortress by constructing defensive structures and fortifying its walls.



SOLO OR CO-OP

BEGEN THIS ADVANTURE BY YOUR SELF OR WITH THE TEAM
Embark on your adventure alone or with a group up to 4 players. Cooperation and understanding are essential for groups to function optimally. Identifying the professions of each individual and developing them can help the group acquire better items more quickly. Developing a diversity skills and weapons of each individual and developing them can help the group achieve the best harmony and diversity in combat strategies.
